summary: An email from an FBI SSA in New York to an unspecified recipient, requesting a quiet check at an airport for Jeffrey Epstein's private jet and discussing coordination for potential law enforcement action in St. Thomas related to an arrest warrant.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email; his private jet is to be checked at an airport, and his arrest warrant is being discussed.

persons.name: TFO
persons.context: Copied on the email, likely a member of a task force involved in the investigation.

persons.name: SSA Squad C-20 VCAC/Human Trafficking FBI New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, coordinating efforts related to Epstein's arrest warrant and potential law enforcement action in St. Thomas.

events.title: Coordination email for Epstein investigation
events.description: An FBI SSA sends an email requesting a quiet check at an airport for Epstein's private jet and discusses coordinating law enforcement action in St. Thomas.
personsInvolved: SSA Squad C-20 VCAC/Human Trafficking FBI New York

keyFacts: The FBI was actively monitoring Jeffrey Epstein's travel via his private jet in July 2019.
An arrest warrant for Epstein was being processed and coordinated at the time of this email.
Law enforcement was preparing for potential action in St. Thomas related to the Epstein case.
The email indicates coordination between the FBI's New York VCAC/Human Trafficking squad and other agents/officers.
